code: void setRecoveryFailure(@Nullable Exception recoveryFailure) {     this.recoveryFailure = recoveryFailure. }
void setRemovalFailure(@Nullable Exception removalFailure) {     this.removalFailure = removalFailure. }

@Override public synchronized SubmittedJobGraph recoverJobGraph(JobID jobId) throws Exception {     if (recoveryFailure != null) {         throw recoveryFailure.     } else {         return super.recoverJobGraph(jobId).     } }

@Override public synchronized void removeJobGraph(JobID jobId) throws Exception {     if (removalFailure != null) {         throw removalFailure.     } else {         super.removeJobGraph(jobId).     } }
